definitions.definition: in an attractive or acceptable way; well

examples.text: The plants are **coming along nicely** *(= growing well)*.

definitions.definition: in a kind, friendly or polite way

examples.text: If you ask her nicely she might say yes.
His novels nicely describe life in Britain between the wars.
Her new business is doing very nicely.
Tomorrow at ten will do nicely *(= will be a good time)*.
